roleset.name: to interpret

example.name: transitive
example.text: In the Lilly case , the appeals court broadly construed a federal statute to grant Medtronic , a medical device manufacturer , an exemption [0] [*]to infringe a patent under certain circumstances [*T*] .
example.arg: a federal statute to grant Medtronic , a medical device manufacturer , an exemption
[0] [*]to infringe a patent under certain circumstances

roleset.note: CONSTRUE-V NOTES: Frames file for 'construe' based on survey of sentences in the WSJ corpus. (from construe.01-v predicate notes)
